channel.title: history on My Chamoru Language Journey
channel.description: Recent content in history on My Chamoru Language Journey

item.title: Ha'ånen "Liberasión"
item.description: TW/CW: Mentions of war. I can’t recall a time when my family celebrated “Liberation Day”. I can recall times that we volunteered at the Sons & Daughters of Guam Club for Liberation fiestas: cleaning, cooking, setting up & breaking down, etc…but being young, I wasn’t interested in the “whys” of fiestas. But celebrating at home? Tåya'. I’m positive there’s complexities behind that. I mean, growing up I only ever heard one story about the war from my dad’s mom.
